creditline: Gift of Ms. Sheryl R. Johnson, wife of artist Paul Lamantia
inscription: on front, in bottom right edge, in black ink: 10 {circled} 30 1/2 x 41 | on back, in bottom center, in black ink: 24 {circled} | on back, in bottom center, in black ink, MIXED MEDIUM | COLLAGE | W 31 1/2 x H 42 1/8 | CRIME ALLEY
medium: Gouache, black ink marker, graphite, and collage on paper
provenance: The artist, Chicago; Sheryl R. Johnson, Chicago (wife of the artist); given to MIA, 2018.
signed: on back, in bottom center, in black ink: PAUL LAMANTIA | 1969 {circled}
title: Crime Alley
